Text: RE Virginia Power Cc I called Virginia Power this am and John Dietrich said we should received a Wire today or tomorrow Original Message From Hanagriff Richard Sent Monday January PM To Giambrone Laura Lokay Michelle Cc Blair Lynn Dietz Rick Subject Virginia Power Laura Virginia Power owes us for Dec reservation and commodity Please contact them and determine when and where they sent the check that they claim to have mailed to us thanks

FW Griffith Gas Electric Estimate Friday Aug HE AM to Saturday Aug HE AMOriginal Message From Mulligan Amy Sent Thursday August PM To Giambrone Laura Hernandez Bert McEvoy Christine Miller Beverly Minter Tracy Mulligan Amy Ward Linda Subject FW Griffith Gas Electric Estimate Friday Aug HE AM to Saturday Aug HE AM From Kenneth G Gruhl ENRONSMTPIMCEANOTESKENNETHGGRUHLCKGGRUHLDUKEENERGYECOME NRONCOM Sent Thursday August PM To Mulligan Amy Allen K Nielsen Beck Mayberry Christopher S Smart Schoolcraft Darrell Darren Stephens David Bowers David P Pell George X Ouzounian James Stebbins Kim White Michael Kerr Michael Wells Sherry Davis Steven Fliflet Steven Fliflet Ted Romo Todd Hendricks Tom Carlson Tyler J Kristensen Subject Griffith Gas Electric Estimate Friday Aug HE AM to Saturday Aug HE AM Auto forwarded by a Rule Test Schedule as follows Stable Operation at Minimum load HE to HE Stable Operation at Base Load HE to HE Steam Turbine Trip HE Plant Shutdown HE Note DETM can call for more or less MW throughout the day between tests as needed The plant shutdown will last for approximately days The scope of work is a subset of the previous planned outage worklist Another plant shutdown will be required later to remove Steam Turbine strainers and to complete the other outage list tasks Embedded image moved to file picpcx picpcx
